movie.title: A Mighty Heart
movie.plot: Based on Mariane Pearl's account of the terrifying and unforgettable story of her husband, Wall Street Journal reporter Danny Pearl's life and death.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 17 nominations.
